https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Afghanistan - one of the most remote and dangerous countries in the world. Yet for the last 20 years, through the turmoil of Russian invasion, retaliation, civil war and religious jihad, an American has traveled through Afghanistan in search of fabulous precious stones. Afghanistan - The Lost Mines of the Pharaohs
